body_html: There is a known issue with sync_rep_opt_v2 with the device setter/chooser related to the allocation of the local variable created in the sync_rep_opt_v2. You can either use the old sync_rep_opt or wait until that is fixed (where we might need to have similar signature anyway). Thanks.
body_text: There is a known issue with sync_rep_opt_v2 with the device setter/chooser related to the allocation of the local variable created in the sync_rep_opt_v2. You can either use the old sync_rep_opt or wait until that is fixed (where we might need to have similar signature anyway). Thanks.
body: There is a known issue with sync_rep_opt_v2 with the device setter/chooser related to the allocation of the local variable created in the sync_rep_opt_v2. You can either use the old sync_rep_opt or wait until that is fixed (where we might need to have similar signature anyway). Thanks.
